value.title: Overview of Power BI Apps
value.excerpt: In this video, first we will talk What is a Power BI App? An App is a Power BI content type which allows to combine dashboards, reports all in one place bundled together.  Here, we will cover the following concepts.  We will start with the explanation of What is a Power BI App? Then we will talk about

value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.

With Relative Time Slicer, we can filter data based on the time.  Sometimes there are situations, where we need to filter

value.title: Show/Hide Multiple Data Values using TME AG Toggle Switch – Custom Visual – Toggle Switch by TME AG
value.excerpt: During this session, we will explore one of the custom visuals in Power BI which is TME AG Toggle Switch in Power BI.
